channel.title: How to add a option dialog?

item.title: How to add a option dialog?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Clicking each of those will result in a button press occuring (or perhaps a bank 5/x/etc depending on what interface you are playing with), you can capture this on the server side using some debugging. Then you just need to keep track of the last interface that was open and handle the action there.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a option dialog?

item.title: How to add a option dialog?
item.dc:creator: @yugioh101 yugioh101
item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

ok so im using a for the most part blank source/client, but heres what im trying to do,

use item X on item X and have it open a 2 option dialog, i have it up to this point

else if(itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1511) { if(playerLevel[9] >= 1) { sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("What Are You Fletching?", 2460); sendFrame126("Arrow Shafts", 2461); sendFrame126("ShortBow(u)", 2462); deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); addItem(48, 1); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[9]), 9);
now my only question is how do i get he two options to do seperate things?

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a option dialog?
